description:
Google People API is the replacement for the deprecated Google Contacts API. This plugin allows you to read an authenticated user's list of contacts, including their Names, Emails, and Phone Numbers. 

Unlike other plugins, this requests the max pageSize of 1,000 contacts so you can sync your whole contact list in one go.
name: Google People (Contacts)
plugin_instructions:
This plugin provides API calls you can use with Bubble's [url=https://manual.bubble.io/core-resources/data/data-sources#get-data-from-an-external-api]Get data from an external API[/url] feature:

[b]List People[/b] - Provides a list of the authenticated user's contacts.

[b]Search People[/b] - Provides a list of contacts in the authenticated user's grouped contacts that matches the search query. The query matches on a contact's names, nickNames, emailAddresses, phoneNumbers, and organizations fields that are from the CONTACT source.

[b]Single Profile[/b] - Provides information about a person by specifying a resource name.

[b]User's Profile[/b] - Provides information about the authenticated user.

[b]List Other Contacts[/b] - List all "Other contacts", that is contacts that are not in a contact group. "Other contacts" are typically auto created contacts from interactions.

[b]Search Other Contacts[/b] - Provides a list of contacts in the authenticated user's other contacts that matches the search query. The query matches on a contact's names, emailAddresses, and phoneNumbers fields that are from the OTHER_CONTACT source.

[b]Requirements[/b]
To use this plugin, you'll need to get a Google Account, create a project for your client, and save your OAuth 2.0 Client ID and Client Secret.

[i]Note: to use this API in a live app in production, you'll need to request approval from Google to use the required scopes.[/i]
